titles.title: Majority Rule Resolution
Majority Rule Resolution
Providing for certain procedures for bringing debate to a close on any question in the House of Representatives and Senate, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary:
Majority Rule Resolution
This concurrent resolution provides that the House of Representatives and the Senate may not require more than a simple majority of those voting, a quorum being present, in order to bring debate to a close in such chamber.
